Bernard Akoi-Jackson (amụrụ n'afọ 1979) bụ onye agụmakwụkwọ Ghana, onye na-ese ihe na onye edemede
A maara ya maka ọrụ ndị na-aga n'ihu na nnwoghari

Ọrụ nka ya na-abụkarị ihe ngosi ma ọ bụ ememe pseudo. Ihe odide ya na-elekwasị anya na mmepe nke oge a nke Africa, nka na ọdịbendị Ghana n'ụzọ abụ na nke obi ụtọ. A maara ya dị ka onye na-eme ilu ma ọ bụ Esu na-eji ihe nzuzu dị oke egwu na-agagharị n'etiti nrụnye, ịgba egwu na uri, vidiyo, na foto. Ọ na-agwakọta njirimara ndị Afrịka na-achị site na ihe ncheta na-agafe agafe na nke na-enweghị isi.
Akoi-Jackson gara Presbyterian Boys' Secondary School, maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
O nwere Bachelor of Fine Arts, Master of Fine Arts na PhD na Painting and Sculpture site na College of Art and Built Environment, Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology.
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2006, o nwere ebe obibi mbụ ya na Kofi Setordj's ArtHAUS ebe ọ mepụtara ọrụ ya '' REDTAPEONBOTTLENECK '' dị ka ọrụ ntinye aka

O nwere ebe obibi na Stedelijk Museum dị ka "Global-Artist -in-Residency n'etiti afọ 2013 na 2014 na Thiami Mnyele Artists' Residency na Amsterdam. Ọ bụ onye nkuzi na College of Art and Built Environment, Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology.
